titleStmt.title: Dictionary, Natural Sciences & Medecine, by Ariel, part 2 of 2

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p: A dictionary of natural sciences and medecine by Édouard Ariel. 2nd part of 2 parts. Part 1 = BnF Indien 140.
The Arabic pagination of BnF Indien 141 continues that of BnF Indien 140. Compare also 1 à 50 (BnF Indien 140, U1a, f[1]r) and 101 à 150 (BnF Indien 141, U1a, f[1]r).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (December 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Verso marbled. Shelfmark on spine and recto.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Recto marbled.
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation 1. f1v blank. Paper with threads. 220 x 350 mm.
222 folios = Dictionary proper. Arabic pagination 393-506 by Ariel; 507-835, 836 by librarian. This pagination continues that of BnF Indien 140. f90 = p. 573-p 574 = paper with threads. 220 x 350 mm.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Verso marbled.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 141 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 141 (f[1]r).

binding.p: Marbled paper covers. Shelfmark on the spine.

origin.origDate: No internal date. Not dated by Vinson (1868) nor by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854), bequeathed in 1855 to the Société Asiatique, Paris (Rosny 1868).

provenance.p: Written by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequeathed by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. — See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 26.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 38r, no. 141.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49). — See p. 38, no. 141.
Vinson, Julien. n.d. BnF Indien 1062, f54r, no. 140 141.
James, Gregory. 2000. Colporuḷ: A History of Tamil Dictionaries. 1st edition. Chennai: Cre-A. — See p. 199, 692.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
